thread.title: Paul Clifford
thread.title_full: Servicing Stop reviewed by Paul Clifford

author: Paul Clifford
title: Paul Clifford
text: fantastic service by servicing stop,very friendly and helpfull.the man from the garage to where the car was going rang the day before to see what time was best for me for pick up.on the day they picked it up bang on time,then service stop rang later to imform me that the car had passed the MOT and to imform me of extra options I could have for the service.Service stop then sent me a text and email with a link to pay,again that was so easy to follow and pay.The garage then returned my car just turned 3pm.The day after service stop contacted me to make sure I was happy with there service..I would really recommend this company and will definitely be using them again...well done for a great service and job.
